attributes.action: End 'Junk Mail' - Royal Mail Leaflet Distribution Service
attributes.background: Almost everyone discards their junk mail immediately after receiving it. Door to doors create a shocking amount of waste on a national scale. Please sign this to help end junk mail in the UK once and for all.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because ending the Royal Mail leaflet distribution service would be a decision for Royal Mail and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might want to sign this petition calling for a ban on junk mail instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249527
